Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Detroit in 1965...
Injured on 5/29/1965 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/16/1966 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/1/1966 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 9/14/1966, off Sonny Siebert (CLE)...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 9/9/1969...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1969, hitting .524 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1970, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against New York (A) on 4/8/1976...
Injured on 10/1/1979 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/16/1980, off Don Demola (OAK)...
